name: Farm Frenzy: Hurricane Season
description: Slip on your overalls, grab your seed bag, and round up your four-legged friends for more frenzied fun as you rebuild your farm in the wake of a hurricane! Harvest a crop of Time Management thrills in Farm Frenzy: Hurricane Season!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1 Processor: 1.5 GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB 3D graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: A screen resolution of 1024x768

reviews.review_text: I love this game! it's sooo much fun, and bringing back so many memories ^^

I got this game in a giveaway provided by the publishers. Fun game and very cutesy! Thanks to Buka Entertainment, Girl Gamers group, and most of all Alawar Stargaze for making a great casual farm simulator game!
